title: What Is Christmas?
subtitle: Why don't people wish you a Festive Christmas?

title: What is Programmer?
subtitle: you probably don't wish people a Merry Birthday?
detail: you probably don't wish people a Merry Birthday very often. You probably also don't hear many Merry Hanukkahs or Merry Ramadans either! What's the deal?

title: Why Do We Say Merry Christmas?
subtitle: Merry Christmas certainly?
detail: Merry Christmas certainly picked up steam in 1843 with the publication of Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol.

title: who is santa claus?
subtitle: Santa Claus bringing gifts to children?
detail: Santa Claus, legendary figure who is the traditional patron of Christmas in the United States and other countries, bringing gifts to children.
